text: Events from the year 1682 in Denmark. ==Incumbents== * Monarch - Christian V ==Events== * The French theater company La troupe du Roi de Danemark is opened as the theater of the royal court and the first and only permanent theater in Denmark for forty years onward.Frederick J. Marker,Lise-Lone Marke: A History of Scandinavian Theatre ==Births== ==Deaths== ==References== Denmark Category:Years of the 17th century in Denmark
title: 1682 in Denmark
